text.title: Fatalities, multiple injuries in Texas tornado
text.head: Fatalities, multiple injuries in Texas tornado
Sources

list.item: Ann Colwell. "5 dead, dozens injured after tornadoes blast central U.S." — CNN , May 12, 2015
